example[0]: You can’t phone her now – it’s gone midnight (=after midnight)!
example[1]: By the time he arrived, it was well past midnight (=after midnight).
example[2]: He’s gone for a midnight swim.
example[3]: The treaty will come into force on the stroke of midnight tonight.
example[4]: The train is due in at midnight.
example[5]: We stayed there until way after midnight.
